body_html: @jart It doesn't seem like we can remove //tensorflow:all_opensource_files as dependency from tensorflow/contrib/makefile/BUILD and I can't figure out how to have these tests access at least the directory structure without this either.
body_text: @jart It doesn't seem like we can remove //tensorflow:all_opensource_files as dependency from tensorflow/contrib/makefile/BUILD and I can't figure out how to have these tests access at least the directory structure without this either.
body: @jart It doesn't seem like we can remove `//tensorflow:all_opensource_files` as dependency from [`tensorflow/contrib/makefile/BUILD`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/BUILD#L21) and I can't figure out how to have these tests access at least the directory structure without this either.
